alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Weber...south central Box Elder...western Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 241 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 11 miles north of Clive, or 36 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving northeast at 30 mph. Wind sensors in Dugway and along Interstate 80 have recorded wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Stansbury Park, Delle, Tooele Army Depot, Skull Valley, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Tooele Army Depot South, Utah Test and Training Range North, Stockton, Rush Valley, Hat Island, Erda, Gunnison Island, Lakeside, Antelope Island State Park and Lake Point. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 58 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys
